mapper.select: select md_id, md_name, md_oneline, md_price, md_category, md_abv, md_discount , truncate( md_price - (md_price / 100 * md_discount), 0 ) sale_price , md_content, md_thumbnail_name, md_thumbnail_path, md_detail_name, md_detail_path, md_content, md_standard_stock, md_sales_rate, md_stock , md_sweet, md_sour, md_sparkling, md_use, md_ratingAvg from md where md_id = #{md_id}

select md_id, md_name, md_oneline, md_price, md_category, md_abv, md_discount , truncate( md_price - (md_price / 100 * md_discount), 0 ) sale_price , md_content, md_thumbnail_name, md_thumbnail_path, md_detail_name, md_detail_path, md_content, md_standard_stock, md_sales_rate, md_stock , md_sweet, md_sour, md_sparkling, md_use, md_ratingAvg from md order by md_id desc limit #{limitNum}, 4
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO md (md_name, md_oneline, md_price, md_category, md_abv , md_thumbnail_name, md_thumbnail_path, md_detail_name, md_detail_path , md_content, md_standard_stock, md_sales_rate, md_stock, md_sweet, md_sour, md_sparkling , md_use, md_discount) VALUES( #{md_name}, #{md_oneline} , #{md_price}, #{md_category}, #{md_abv} , #{md_thumbnail_name}, #{md_thumbnail_path}, #{md_detail_name}, #{md_detail_path}, #{md_content}, #{md_standard_stock}, 0, #{md_standard_stock}, #{md_sweet}, #{md_sour}, #{md_sparkling}, #{md_use}, #{md_discount})
